languages.text: "Дарственная на колонию, которую ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Без присмотра неравнодушной хозяйки она, поди, вновь захиреет, но было славно помечтать о собственном доме".
"The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."
languages.original_text: "Дарственная на колонию, которую ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Без присмотра неравнодушной хозяйки она, поди, вновь захиреет, но было славно помечтать о собственном доме".

traits.locale_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你送给我的殖民地契约也在这里。它尽职的女主人不再看护它，恐怕它也会随之凋敝。不过，能短暂地做个美梦，在梦中能有自己的家，真的是太好了。”
languages.original_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: “你送给我的殖民地契约也在这里。它尽职的女主人不再看护它，恐怕它也会随之凋敝。不过，能短暂地做个美梦，在梦中能有自己的家，真的是太好了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アンタがくれたコロニーの証書もある。心配性の女主人の目がなければ、きっと枯れてしまうだろうね。でも、一時は自分の家を持つことができるなんて、素晴らしい夢だったよ」
languages.original_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタがくれたコロニーの証書もある。心配性の女主人の目がなければ、きっと枯れてしまうだろうね。でも、一時は自分の家を持つことができるなんて、素晴らしい夢だったよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Las escrituras de la colonia que me cedió también están aquí. Seguro que se marchita y muere sin los cuidados de su atribulada señora, pero fue bonito soñar con tener mi propio hogar, por breve que fuese el momento».
languages.original_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: «Las escrituras de la colonia que me cedió también están aquí. Seguro que se marchita y muere sin los cuidados de su atribulada señora, pero fue bonito soñar con tener mi propio hogar, por breve que fuese el momento».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai aussi rapporté l'acte de propriété de la colonie que vous m'aviez offerte. Sans l'œil vigilant de sa maîtresse attentionnée, elle risque fortement de dépérir, mais j'ai pris grand plaisir à rêver de posséder un lieu bien à moi, ne serait-ce que pour un temps. »
languages.original_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aussi rapporté l'acte de propriété de la colonie que vous m'aviez offerte. Sans l'œil vigilant de sa maîtresse attentionnée, elle risque fortement de dépérir, mais j'ai pris grand plaisir à rêver de posséder un lieu bien à moi, ne serait-ce que pour un temps. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Die Besitzurkunde der Kolonie ist ebenfalls dabei. Ohne das wachsame Auge seiner besorgten Herrin wird sie bestimm zugrunde gehen, aber für eine Zeit lang war es schön, von einem Zuhause zu träumen."
languages.original_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: "Die Besitzurkunde der Kolonie ist ebenfalls dabei. Ohne das wachsame Auge seiner besorgten Herrin wird sie bestimm zugrunde gehen, aber für eine Zeit lang war es schön, von einem Zuhause zu träumen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bana verdiğin koloninin tapusu da burada. Onu gözleyen sahibesinin ilgili bakışları olmayınca solacağına şüphe yok ama kendime ait bir yuva hayali kurabilmek, bir süreliğine de olsa harikaydı."
languages.original_text: "The deed to the colony you gave me is here as well. Without the watchful eye of its concerned mistress, it will surely wither, but it was wonderful to dream of a home of my own for a time."

traits.locale_text: "Bana verdiğin koloninin tapusu da burada. Onu gözleyen sahibesinin ilgili bakışları olmayınca solacağına şüphe yok ama kendime ait bir yuva hayali kurabilmek, bir süreliğine de olsa harikaydı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
